benefitsTitle.subTitle: The benefits of becoming a JSSD member are many!

benefits.title: Your Fees go to JSSD General Donation Fund
benefits.description: Your membership fees contribute to the JSSD General Donation Fund to support community activities.

benefits.title: Free Pass to JSSD Annual Picnic
benefits.description: Enjoy a complimentary pass to the JSSD Annual Picnic — a day of fun, food, and community bonding.

benefits.title: Discounted Rates for JSSD Events
benefits.description: As a member, you receive discounted rates on various JSSD events.
subpoints: Renting JSSD Facilities for Private Events

benefits.title: Access to Members Only Events
benefits.description: Gain access to exclusive members-only events hosted by JSSD.

benefits.title: Eligible to sign-up for volunteer hours for President’s Volunteer Service Award (PVSA) program
benefits.description: Members can sign up for volunteer opportunities that count towards the PVSA program.

benefits.title: Preference to Limited Attendance Activities
benefits.description: Get preference for attending activities with limited spots.

benefits.title: Right to Vote in JSSD Elections
benefits.description: Exercise your right to vote in the JSSD elections and shape the future of the community.

benefits.title: Membership Fees Are Tax Deductible
benefits.description: Your membership fees may be tax deductible as per applicable laws.

membershipTypesTitle.subTitle: Following membership types are available at JSSD

membershipTypes.title: Family Annual
membershipTypes.coverage: Entire family (children under 18) for the calendar year.

membershipTypes.title: Individual Annual
membershipTypes.coverage: One individual for the calendar year.

membershipRules: 1. A husband and wife with unmarried children under the age of twenty-one (21) and/or parent(s) and/or grandparent(s);
2. An individual with unmarried children under the age of twenty-one (21) and/or parent(s) and/or grandparent(s);
3. An individual or husband and wife with parents living with them.

noteRule.noteRule1: Your sister and her family would need to sign up separately.
noteRule.noteRule2: Only primary and secondary member of the membership will be eligible to vote for JSSD elections.

query: For any questions you may have regarding membership, please contact
